description: Explore the security features of Arbitrum, a leading Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum. This analysis covers Arbitrum's architecture, security measures, potential vulnerabilities, and its roadmap for future improvements.
keywords: Arbitrum, Ethereum, Layer 2, scaling solution, security, architecture, smart contracts, optimistic rollups, decentralization, fraud proofs, economic incentives, vulnerabilities, quantum computing, blockchain
title: Assessing the Security of Arbitrum: A Comprehensive Analysis
